task_definition_name: Mifos - Design A 404 Not Found Page For Mifos X Web App
description:
## Objective
The objective is to design a 404 not found page when a user tries to access unintended routes.

### Description
Currently, when a user tries to access unintended routes he/she is redirected back to the home page. Design a 404 error page in the NotFoundComponent using HTML and SCSS. Design maybe simple, use your imagination to make it look cool and beautiful.

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/web-app).
